text: Elmler Akademiyasi is a Baku Metro station. It was opened on 31 December 1985. It is named after the Azerbaijan National Academy of Sciences () which is nearby. ==Related pages== *List of Baku metro stations ==References== Category:Baku Metro stations Category:1985 establishments in Asia Category:1985 establishments in Europe
title: Elmler Akademiyasi (Baku Metro)
